overview: The fossil of a completely intact armoured dinosaur, Borealopelta markmitchelli, is discovered in Canada. Dinosaur Cold Case follows the evidence, as paleontologists piece together the prehistoric clues of Borealopeltaâ€™s life and death.  Why was it found upside down, in what was once an inland sea? How did it die and why was it so perfectly fossilized?
title: Dinosaur Cold Case
